db:abstract.db:para: A touch-based app for shuffling photos around a virtual surface.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
QT += qml quick qtHaveModule(widgets): QT += widgets SOURCES += main.cpp RESOURCES += photosurface.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quick/demos/photosurface INSTALLS += target ICON = resources/icon.png macx: ICON = resources/photosurface.icns win32: RC_FILE = resources/photosurface.rc
